医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
口服阿奇霉素可降低资源匮乏地区孕产妇败血症和医疗费用据世界卫生组织称，败血症是一种严重感染，可导致组织损伤、器官衰竭和死亡，是全球孕产妇死亡的三大原因之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Oral-azithromycin-reduces-maternal-sepsis-and-healthcare-costs-in-low-resource-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Oral-azithromycin-reduces-maternal-sepsis-and-healthcare-costs-in-low-resource-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a15a572-9bb5-43ba-b5b4-601e16decef7 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 20:51:40 -0500 Oral azithromycin reduces maternal sepsis and healthcare costs in low-resource settings
细胞因子干扰素-γ可以成为多系统萎缩的疾病缓解治疗靶点多系统萎缩是一种罕见且致命的神经退行性疾病，其中蛋白质α-突触核蛋白的不溶性内含物出现在大脑的少突胶质细胞中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Cytokine-interferon-gamma-can-be-a-disease-modifying-therapeutic-target-in-multiple-system-atropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Cytokine-interferon-gamma-can-be-a-disease-modifying-therapeutic-target-in-multiple-system-atropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c6072c5-0222-4ab0-a63e-0e09ab0c206e Mon, 12 Feb 2024 20:46:35 -0500 Cytokine interferon-gamma can be a disease-modifying therapeutic target in multiple system atrophy
染色体异常的 Mad2 表达水平可作为食管癌的生物标志物2024 年 2 月 5 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“Mad2 基因的差异表达与人类食管癌样本中启动子区域组蛋白 H3 翻译后修饰的模式有关。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Mad2-express-levels-with-chromosomal-abnormalities-can-be-a-biomarker-for-esophageal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Mad2-express-levels-with-chromosomal-abnormalities-can-be-a-biomarker-for-esophageal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70dd2c83-d8b6-4a59-ab02-277f42e5d5fe Mon, 12 Feb 2024 20:36:17 -0500 Mad2 expression levels with chromosomal abnormalities can be a biomarker for esophageal cancer
研究表明，妊娠并发症还可能导致孩子的心血管健康状况恶化妊娠高血压疾病 (HDP) 和妊娠糖尿病 (GDM) 是两种最常见的妊娠并发症，使孕妇在以后的生活中患心血管疾病的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Pregnancy-complications-may-also-result-in-worse-cardioangio-health-for-the-child-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Pregnancy-complications-may-also-result-in-worse-cardioangio-health-for-the-child-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f904b97d-e31b-4152-a2b1-34816118a579 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 20:29:44 -0500 Pregnancy complications may also result in worse cardiovascular health for the child, study suggests
研究人员发现噪音引起的听力损失的分子机制任何去过喧闹音乐会的人都知道耳鸣的感觉。有些人在喧闹的噪音停止后会出现暂时甚至永久性的听力损失或对声音的感知发生巨大变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Researchers-discover-a-molecular-mechanism-of-noise-induced-hearing-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Researchers-discover-a-molecular-mechanism-of-noise-induced-hearing-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15271ef1-d260-4e24-a2b3-592428367170 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 20:26:02 -0500 Researchers discover a molecular mechanism of noise-induced hearing loss
研究发现，每日服用阿司匹林与老年人死亡率较高有关ASPREE 临床试验的一项研究发现，70 岁以上的成年人每天摄入阿司匹林并不会增加无残疾生存率，而且会导致较高的全因死亡率，主要是由于癌症相关的死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Daily-aspirin-linked-to-higher-mortality-in-older-adults-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Daily-aspirin-linked-to-higher-mortality-in-older-adults-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ca886ea-e598-49ee-a9cf-66c8847eaf70 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 19:18:00 -0500 Daily aspirin linked to higher mortality in older adults, study finds
在代谢综合征研究中，蓝莓可以促进平静，但不能提高认知能力《美国临床营养学杂志》上的一项研究发现，长期摄入蓝莓并不能显着改善患有代谢综合征的成年人的认知功能、警觉性或情绪，尽管在高脂肪、高糖餐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Blueberry-boost-calmness-but-not-cognition-in-metabolic-syndrome-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Blueberry-boost-calmness-but-not-cognition-in-metabolic-syndrome-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a428d7e3-982d-428f-8b8b-48a86ba457de Mon, 12 Feb 2024 19:02:00 -0500 Blueberries boost calmness but not cognition in metabolic syndrome study
橄榄油对抗阿尔茨海默氏症的秘密武器：酚类化合物《国际分子科学杂志》上的一篇综合评论强调了特级初榨橄榄油及其酚类化合物通过各种机制预防和治疗阿尔茨海默病的潜力，包括减少淀粉样蛋白积累和神经炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Olive-oils-secret-weapon-against-Alzheimers-phenolic-compounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Olive-oils-secret-weapon-against-Alzheimers-phenolic-compounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6511644f-c178-412c-b563-b852ef070d91 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 18:28:00 -0500 Olive oil's secret weapon against Alzheimer's: phenolic compounds
研究发现左右转弯所需的复杂神经网络中缺失的部分你有没有想过当我们向右或向左移动时大脑会发生什么？大多数人不这么认为；他们只是不假思索地去做。但这个简单的动作实际上是由一个复杂的过程控制的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-uncovers-missing-piece-in-the-complex-nerve-network-needed-for-left-right-turns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-uncovers-missing-piece-in-the-complex-nerve-network-needed-for-left-right-turns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7844e154-aef6-45a6-bb06-8b5b0d5b27d6 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 14:33:13 -0500 Study uncovers missing piece in the complex nerve-network needed for left-right turns
通过标准血液测试可以预测心脏病发作使用标准血液测试和在线工具的结果，您可以确定您在六个月内心脏病发作的风险是否增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Heart-attacks-can-be-predicted-with-a-standard-blood-test.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Heart-attacks-can-be-predicted-with-a-standard-blood-test.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06dbbe92-36bc-4fa6-be4d-32b9a3d704ea Mon, 12 Feb 2024 14:23:00 -0500 Heart attacks can be predicted with a standard blood test
